title: Riottyphon banned me after i was told to kill myself.
body:
Banned when someone to go Kill myself? 

Confused why im toxic? (he said my daddy works for riot) hmmm interesting.

READ THE LOGS RIOT AND FIX THIS ABUSE OF POWER

replies.body:
Game 1
In-Game
revived 2k13: i start red
revived 2k13: wtffff
revived 2k13: i need red.
revived 2k13: that was dumb bard

revived 2k13: or are u 12?

revived 2k13: gl with ban

revived 2k13: its ok:)
revived 2k13: i have a message ready to copy n paste
revived 2k13: :)
revived 2k13: no need
revived 2k13: i muted vi
revived 2k13: anyways

> revived 2k13: u said kys enough for a ban

if you know it's enough for a ban, why did you said it thrice?  Really don't need to have any kind of relative that works for rito to know you'll get banned for it.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Submit a support ticket and plead your case that you only repeating what someone said and cross your fingers.  I would honestly leave out the conspiracy part.

You've got the survival instincts of a corpse.

Would like to point out, if you're standing in front of a robot with a gun that says "Bearers of gang symbols will be shot", and in passing your dad says "That's scary, I don't even know what a gang symbol looks like!" and you "Oh, like this!" *makes gesture*

BANG.

In questioning: "Why did you make a gang symbol?"
"I wanted to show my dad."
*sigh* "You willingly made a gang symbol of your own accord, you deserved to be shot."

And this is irony

Besides the repeating what he said part you did say toxic things dude. like calling them 12 years old based on actions telling them their KDA calling them dumb and even simply telling them they will get banned in general. But the whole repeating what they said thing probably triggered it the most just other things added on to it and it could have been solved by simply just muting or not even typing in the first place

Jesus Christ, even if you didn't said that you deserve to be banned, you are type of player who commands to all of your teammates same rank as you, but you believe that you are better than them and that you know everything about this game. ****

>Riottyphon banned me after i was told to kill myself.



Do u have any proof  of your claims ?

screenshot ?  something ?

Person said you should go kys and I told them basically that was messed up and that I’m pretty sure you can get banned for that. And then all of a sudden he says my dad works at riot and ban 2 mins after game.

That is most likely not what happened, you'll need to provide the chat logs given to you if you wish to discuss a punishment.

 You can find your chat logs by attempting to log in to the restricted account or [by filing a support ticket.](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
That is what happened. I’m getting chat logs now

You got banned because of your chat logs. Do you seriously think a Riot employee would risk losing their cushy job with great benefits and a six figure salary just because their child flamed you in a video game? Get real.

You broke the rules, and that's why you got banned. "kys" is a **ZERO TOLERANCE** phrase - you should not repeat it, say it, or anything in game. You do not **NEED** to repeat what they said.

someone in game told ME to kill MYSELF and I get banned for their behavior im so confused?


I told him that I believe it was wrong and repeating the phrase that person said is wrong???
Im simply trying to make that person a better human by explaining that's a dirty phrase and carries severe consequences when people feel bullied. 

How am I at fault?

> [{quoted}](name=revived 2k13,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zEjKLmaH,comment-id=000000020000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T05:26:08.624+0000)
>
> someone in game told ME to kill MYSELF and I get banned for their behavior im so confused?
> 
> 
> I told him that I believe it was wrong and repeating the phrase that person said is wrong???
> Im simply trying to make that person a better human by explaining that's a dirty phrase and carries severe consequences when people feel bullied. 
> 
> How am I at fault?

you typed it.  It's that simple. Did you tell anyone to do it?  No.  Did you type it?  Yes.  Does Riot's automated system give a fuck about context?  No.

No, you got banned **because you repeated thee incorrect behavior**. You **KNEW** it would result in a ban. Yet you said it anyway. No sympathy here.

Stop expecting rules to apply to others but not you. This is like driving up to a "no refusal weekend" drunk-driving checkpoint while drunk and saying "so I know you have no refusal and no tolerance but hey i've had 5 drinks already".

buddy.  I never directed that comment at him? what are you talking about?


Calling for Riot Typhon please.

Did I say you did? Riot has **zero tolerance for the uttering of k.y.s period**. Because by definition saying "kys" you are saying "kill yourself".

You were banned because you used a phrase **that you knew was zero tolerance**.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zEjKLmaH,comment-id=000000020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T05:29:45.214+0000)
>
> Did I say you did? Riot has **zero tolerance for the uttering of k.y.s period**. Because by definition saying "kys" you are saying "kill yourself".
> 
> You were banned because you used a phrase **that you knew was zero tolerance**.

I am pretty sure it needs to be directed to others in order to get a ban for it. 
However looking at the chat logs. this player seams to be toxic enough. Belittling people is not acceptable. For example comparing someone based on their age. The whole chat log was toxic overall.

[No, it doesn't need to be directed. Doesn't matter if its racism or KYS, it's the same for all ZT phrases.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/tmmhjOVE-banned-14-days-for-a-joke)

edit-response to Wimbledofy, because I'm not going to make a new post to answer that:
All Zero Tolerance phrases are handled the same and have the same rules, which is, don't use them at all. Not even approximations. The thread demonstrates that ZT phrases don't need to be directed at a person to be a violation.
Why was this thread linked? It isn't relevant.

WAIT WAIT WAIT so because I said k.y.s like that person im banned as well when it was directed at me and nobody in exsistence? 

yeah im sending in a ticket should be unbanned.

No, you will not be unbanned. You knew it was against the rules, yet you said it. On top of that, you said it to harass another player, which is not acceptable. Just because "they did it first" does not make it okay.
youre clearly mistaken and believe that I directed that comment at others. I did not so I will send a request and hopefully be on in no time.

No, I am not mistaken.

**That phrase is not okay, period, end of sentence. It does not matter in what way you use that phrase, it is not acceptable in League ever. End of discussion**.

You are mistaken in that you think the rules apply to others but not you.

Response to Pyrosan.

Very wrong. Firstly, you're not allowed to use ZT phrases in reference anywhere in League, *the Player Behavior forum is explicitly an exception*. You may not quote the use of ZT phrases, [even if directed at no-one.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/tmmhjOVE-banned-14-days-for-a-joke)

Lastly, while practically speaking, context matters, the rules again explicitly state that context does NOT matter, for ALL the rules.

> bans like this should be reverted, he didn't point it towards anyone he was quoting what was said to him
> quoting is not against the rules

quoting ZT is against the rules.  There are more than a handful of cases where it is punished.

> kys is a trigger phrase but it doesn't mean you should be banned for using it in the context of a quote lol
> 
> if i say "report lb told me to kill myself" why the fuck am i getting banned if they're the offender 

but WHY do you need to say it?  You have the obvious 1 report = 9 reports thing.

If you say it to your team, why?  They can see the same chat you can.  They can see the person said it and can make up their own minds if they want to report or not.  Why do you need to repeat it to your team?

If you say it to the enemies, why?  It's basically he said, she said because the enemies cannot verify what you said is true.  I can say "Pyrosan told me to kys, please report" even if it's a lie, how would the enemies know?  Why would they report someone based on something they did not/could not see themselves?  

As such, why does ZT need to consider context of a quote that should not need to be said to begin with.

> [{quoted}](name=Pyrosan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zEjKLmaH,comment-id=00000002000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2020-02-28T06:09:04.004+0000)
>
> bans like this should be reverted, he didn't point it towards anyone he was quoting what was said to him
> quoting is not against the rules
> kys is a trigger phrase but it doesn't mean you should be banned for using it in the context of a quote lol
> 
> if i say "report lb told me to kill myself" why the fuck am i getting banned if they're the offender

1 ban is enough so you don't need to try persuade others as that's against the summoner's code itself. Though I fully agree with what you're saying, RIOT just wants you to mute, report and move on.

(edit: reply to Jng Account)

Is that so? I think not. Pretty sure one could say at the start of the game: "lolz kys is a zt phrase" and get banned. Have you seen a case where a ZT punishment was reversed? There are two I know of: the "Dutch Kiss", where "kys" means "kiss" in Dutch, and Riot Tantrum personally reversing a pile of cases where players were being coerced into saying ZT phrases by people threatening to throw the game if they didn't.

The moral? Just don't ever say ZT phrases, under any circumstance- that's why it's called Zero Tolerance. Nobody like Tantrum is doing that anymore- you really have to make a good case to reverse it now. This is not a good case.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zEjKLmaH,comment-id=0000000200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T05:35:19.638+0000)
>
> No, I am not mistaken.
> 
> **That phrase is not okay, period, end of sentence. It does not matter in what way you use that phrase, it is not acceptable in League ever. End of discussion**.
> 
> You are mistaken in that you think the rules apply to others but not you.

bans like this should be reverted, he didn't point it towards anyone he was quoting what was said to him
quoting is not against the rules
kys is a trigger phrase but it doesn't mean you should be banned for using it in the context of a quote lol

if i say "report lb told me to kill myself" why the fuck am i getting banned if they're the offender

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zEjKLmaH,comment-id=00000002000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T05:32:53.143+0000)
>
> No, you will not be unbanned. You knew it was against the rules, yet you said it. On top of that, you said it to harass another player, which is not acceptable. Just because "they did it first" does not make it okay.

Op never told anybody to kys, he simply told all chat that he was told to kys. 

When you're reporting what somebody else said that's offensive or disrespectful, you have to be able to communicate what was said to you.

To the OP, you don't need to get allies and support from in game. Mute the guy, don't entertain him with a response and report after game. Also, you didn't do anything wrong. You're just a victim of a chat bot programmed to autoban certain phrases.

The system is a machine that simply looks for that phrase; it doesn't look at context, it doesn't look at the rest of the chat and attempt to understand it, it simply looks for 0 tolerance words and bans anyone that types them.

There was even a case where a Danish player, talking to another Danish player, on EUW (where Denmark is), was banned for typing 'kys', despite that being the Danish for 'kiss'.
At least tell the whole story.  Was that ban on the Danish "kiss" upheld?
and there was a player that commented here who compared danish with "ompa loompa" language to justify Riot posture. Guess who was))
Got chat logs of myself but no in game proof of the vi who did it
provide the chat logs  then ?
How do I post them?
How do I do that?
Unfortunately, "kys" is a trigger word, and even saying "you said kys" is enough to get you banned. Kinda late now, but if someone says it just mute 'em and report.
I did but why am I banned for 14 days after mentioning he can get me banned via "family" for riot. abnormal to receive ban right after that occurs can a moderator check this out please.

You said it a total of 3 times.  Doesn't take a genuis or "family" that works for rito to know you'll get banned pretty quickly.  Hell, you even said the reason why yourself.  Why the surprise?

> revived 2k13: riot has a huge no tolerance policy with "kys" comments

Hey,

So just a forum mod; I can’t affect your punishment. 

But it does have “kys” in it, which you already know to be a severe offense. Perpetuating this by repeating it likely led to your suspension. 

People can say whatever about someone working at Riot; that doesn’t mean it’s true. Even if it were, I don’t think that affects whether or not you receive a punishment, as it was more than likely handled by an automated system. 

Did you speak to a Rioter? What did they say?

There are two stories in one here. Lets break them down.

1/ the "kys". We have a rare case here where contexts matters. "Repeating" is naive but can be appealed. Theres a difference between "kys too" and "why did you tell me kys? that horrible". ----> Contact Player Support and be patient and detailed.

2/ A Rioter? I have no idea what you are talking about. There is no "riot typhon" in your match history and the daddy story is a troll. You got trolled by someone trying to scare you, he knew you had naively typed ZT words and that he only needed to report you at the end of the game. If you contact Player Support, dont forget to mention this story because impersonating or lying about ties with Riot Games is a serious offense:
https://www.riotgames.com/en/terms-of-service  7.1.

rujitra is **so**  against ****_everything_**** i find it_ kinda **funny**_. <-- See how annoying it is to read that alone? He knew saying kys is against the rules but im **SURE** he didnt expect simply typing it without intent would result in a ban for him. Have at least some consideration and don't go wishing his account to stay banned for that.

OP, you got banned because you were repeating a ZT phrase. (kys)
It doesnt matter if it wasnt directed at any1, just saying it can get you banned.

In the future dont repeat those words, and if any1 tells you that, just report them without saying anything to them back (and mute if they bother you)

Jesus guys most of really aren’t not helping at all. The OP overreacted a bit for sure but nothing more. And repeating something by not insulting the other person should not have a penalty at all. 

And many ppl said these three letters sometime at least once during there gaming years. And one time should really not be a big deal. Stop being snowflakes. And Riot support should really read the hole sentences and course of the conversation before judging by single words.
It's an extremely stupid ban. Take this to riot support, they'll probably help you with the next steps. This is one of the reasons ZT policies are asinine.
The amount of victim blaming in this thread is astounding, you guys should be ashamed of yourselves.

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Please be nice to them, and when you're nice to them they are willing to work with you.
Good luck OP, remember not to repeat bannable offenses even if you were repeating what was said to you. As you know by now, it's an automated system that detects words that are considered punishable, and not actual human beings.
The link I sent to you will first be directed at Blitzcrank Bot, who is indeed a bot, and click on the link he gives you and then you will be redirected to a human being who will manually take a look at what happened and hopefully uplift the ban for you.
Why ban an account for verbal language when mutes exist. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}  The fact chat logs only ever show the posts u made and not what other write is just a form of incrimination.
